typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Currency Type} as string,
		Engagement as string,
		Engagement_Description as string,
		Engagement_Manager as string,
		Engagement_Manager_Name as string,
		Engagement_Partner as string,
		Engagement_Partner_Name as string,
		Engagement_Profit_Center as string,
		Engagement_Responsible_Person_Job_Level_Global as string,
		Fiscal_Year_Period as string,
		Office as string,
		Current_Inputs_Rolling12mths_Ltcp as string,
		Eng_Age_Kpi as string,
		Inputs_Over365days_LTP as string,
		Lockup_Days_Without_Tax_Ltcp as string,
		Net_Investment_With_Tax_Ltcp as string,
		Unbilled_WIP_Ltcp as string,
		ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceRaw
sourceRaw derive(Engagement_Description = sha2(256, Engagement_Description)) ~> MaskingEngagementDescription
MaskingEngagementDescription sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
